Look for the presence of the targetword into a character string Provide list of files and return summary of counts of occurence of the target world

ccdr.pages.Rd

Look for the presence of the targetword into a character string Provide list of files and return summary of counts of occurence of the target world

ccdr.pages(files, targetword, brute_freq = F, parrallel = T)

Arguments

files

a character string correspond to the text to analysis
targetword

a vector of characters corresponding to word to search and count for in the text
brute_freq

T if you only want the frequency count of the word, if F the output is the it provides the term frequency for the set of targetwords provided
parrallel

if T the function use the mclapply function to use parrallele computing from the package "parrallele"

Value

return the number of occurence of the targetword for each file

Author

Manuel Betin

Contents

Developed by Manuel Betin, Umberto Collodel.
